Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Southwest Highway, 83rd, Lawndale and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Skokie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
